text: "Human Nature" is a song by the American singer-songwriter Michael Jackson. It was written by Steve Porcaro and John Bettis. It was the fifth song from his sixth solo record Thriller. "Human Nature" was released on July 3, 1983. It was a moderate hit in America and other countries. This song has been covered, performed and sampled by other musicians. Category:1983 songs Category:Pop songs Category:Michael Jackson songs
title: Human Nature (Michael Jackson song)
